array.string: I bought peaches for my mom.
I bought a water melon for my yougner brother.
Those rays comes from the Sun.
나:I@@는:a particle for subject after vowel@@일찍:early@@일어납니다:wake up
사람:person@@은: a particle for subject after consonant@@누구나:anybody else@@외롭습니다:lonely
누가:who@@유리창:window glass@@을:a particle for object after consonant@@깼습니까:break
엄마: mom@~위해: for@@복숭아: a peach@@를:a particle for object after vowel@@샀습니다:buy
동생: younger brother@@수박: a water melon@@을: a particle for object after consonant
저: that@@빛: ray@@태양: the Sun@@~으로부터: from, out of@@옵니다: come
